title: Inbox Watcher Notification Injection Not Implemented

comment: QA PRE-REVIEW: CR-056-VAR-003 v0.1 -- RECOMMEND. FRONTMATTER: title='Inbox Watcher Notification Injection Not Implemented' (present, non-empty). revision_summary='Initial draft' (acceptable for v0.1). SCOPE HANDOFF (SOP-004 9A.5): Expected vs actual documented (detection works, injection not implemented). What works vs what is missing explicitly listed in Section 5. Follow-up CR absorbs three specific requirements (Section 6). No scope silently dropped. CROSS-REFERENCE VERIFICATION against CR-056: Section 4 line 59 ('Agents see a visual notification') CONFIRMED. Section 5.6 lines 160-182 (docker exec injection design) CONFIRMED. T4 line 227 ('verify qa receives inbox notification') CONFIRMED. EI-5 line 284 (watchdog monitoring, no mention of injection) CONFIRMED -- gap is real. TYPE 2 JUSTIFICATION: Core multi-agent objective met, notification injection is convenience/UX improvement. Reasonable classification per SOP-004 9A.2. PLACEHOLDER CHECK: Placeholders only in executable block editable fields (Sections 7-8), correct per SOP-004 Section 5. No TBD/TODO/FIXME in pre-approved content. TRACEABILITY: Valid references to SOP-004, CR-056, CR-056-VAR-001, CR-057. All confirmed. FORMATTING: No typos, consistent formatting, sequential numbering. DETERMINATION: COMPLIANT.
